languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас косой взгляд, его губы растягиваются в холодной змеиной улыбке.{/n} "Я не считаю необузданные эмоции чем-то необходимым в каждодневном общении. Но, уверяю вас, я более чем способен на гнев. К счастью для окружающих, я научился его фокусировать. Правильно отмеренная ярость раскрывает весь потенциал боевой псайканы так же, как пряный сыр — ноты выдержанного амасека".

{n}Heinrix gives you a sidelong glance, his lips stretched into a caustic smile.{/n} "I don't consider raw emotions to be a necessity in everyday communication. But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас косой взгляд, его губы растягиваются в холодной змеиной улыбке.{/n} "Я не считаю необузданные эмоции чем-то необходимым в каждодневном общении. Но, уверяю вас, я более чем способен на гнев. К счастью для окружающих, я научился его фокусировать. Правильно отмеренная ярость раскрывает весь потенциал боевой псайканы так же, как пряный сыр — ноты выдержанного амасека".

But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

languages.text: {n}海因里希斜着眼瞥了你一眼，嘴角露出了刻薄的微笑。{/n}“我认为原始的感情在日常交流中毫无必要，不过我可以向你保证，我表达愤怒的能力相当强大。不过，好消息是，我已经学会了控制愤怒。适度的愤怒有助于让灵能者释放全部的力量，就好像熟成奶酪有助于引出精酿艾玛赛克酒全部美味一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a sidelong glance, his lips stretched into a caustic smile.{/n} "I don't consider raw emotions to be a necessity in everyday communication. But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希斜着眼瞥了你一眼，嘴角露出了刻薄的微笑。{/n}“我认为原始的感情在日常交流中毫无必要，不过我可以向你保证，我表达愤怒的能力相当强大。不过，好消息是，我已经学会了控制愤怒。适度的愤怒有助于让灵能者释放全部的力量，就好像熟成奶酪有助于引出精酿艾玛赛克酒全部美味一样。”

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a sidelong glance, his lips stretched into a caustic smile.{/n} "I don't consider raw emotions to be a necessity in everyday communication. But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira de soslayo con los labios retorcidos en una sonrisa mordaz.{/n} «No considero que las emociones desbocadas sean necesarias para la comunicación en el día a día, pero le aseguro que estoy perfectamente capacitado para sentir ira. Por suerte para los demás, aprendí a concentrarla. Una furia templada revela el potencial máximo de los poderes psíquicos en combate, al igual que el queso curado revela el regusto del amasec añejo».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a sidelong glance, his lips stretched into a caustic smile.{/n} "I don't consider raw emotions to be a necessity in everyday communication. But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira de soslayo con los labios retorcidos en una sonrisa mordaz.{/n} «No considero que las emociones desbocadas sean necesarias para la comunicación en el día a día, pero le aseguro que estoy perfectamente capacitado para sentir ira. Por suerte para los demás, aprendí a concentrarla. Una furia templada revela el potencial máximo de los poderes psíquicos en combate, al igual que el queso curado revela el regusto del amasec añejo».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたに横目で視線を送り、唇を引き伸ばして苛烈な笑みを浮かべた。{/n} 「私は日常的なコミュニケーションに生の感情は必要ないと考えている。しかし、私は怒ることもできるのだ。他者にとっては幸いなことに、私はそれを集中することを学んだ。熟成されたチーズが熟成されたアマセックの香りを示すのと同じように、適切に用いられた怒りは、戦闘用サイカナの潜在能力を最大限に引き出すのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a sidelong glance, his lips stretched into a caustic smile.{/n} "I don't consider raw emotions to be a necessity in everyday communication. But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたに横目で視線を送り、唇を引き伸ばして苛烈な笑みを浮かべた。{/n} 「私は日常的なコミュニケーションに生の感情は必要ないと考えている。しかし、私は怒ることもできるのだ。他者にとっては幸いなことに、私はそれを集中することを学んだ。熟成されたチーズが熟成されたアマセックの香りを示すのと同じように、適切に用いられた怒りは、戦闘用サイカナの潜在能力を最大限に引き出すのだ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix blickt dich von der Seite her an, die Lippen zu einem säuerlichen Lächeln verzogen.{/n} "Ich betrachte rohe Emotionen nicht als Notwendigkeit für die alltägliche Kommunikation. Ich versichere Euch jedoch, dass ich sehr wohl zum Zorn fähig bin. Zum Glück für meine Umwelt habe ich gelernt, ihn zielgerichtet einzusetzen. Korrekt dosierter Zorn offenbart das volle Potenzial von Kampf-Psykana in etwa wie ein gut gealterter Käse die Noten eines reifen Amasec offenbart."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a sidelong glance, his lips stretched into a caustic smile.{/n} "I don't consider raw emotions to be a necessity in everyday communication. But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

Ich versichere Euch jedoch, dass ich sehr wohl zum Zorn fähig bin. Zum Glück für meine Umwelt habe ich gelernt, ihn zielgerichtet einzusetzen. Korrekt dosierter Zorn offenbart das volle Potenzial von Kampf-Psykana in etwa wie ein gut gealterter Käse die Noten eines reifen Amasec offenbart."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous jette un regard en coin, un sourire caustique aux lèvres.{/n} « Ce n'est pas parce que j'estime les émotions brutes impropres à la communication quotidienne que la colère m'est un sentiment étranger. Heureusement pour mon entourage, j'ai appris à la contrôler. Une rage bien dosée peut sublimer la psykana, de la même manière qu'un fromage bien fait révèle toutes les saveurs d'un amasec arrivé à maturation. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a sidelong glance, his lips stretched into a caustic smile.{/n} "I don't consider raw emotions to be a necessity in everyday communication. But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous jette un regard en coin, un sourire caustique aux lèvres.{/n} « Ce n'est pas parce que j'estime les émotions brutes impropres à la communication quotidienne que la colère m'est un sentiment étranger. Heureusement pour mon entourage, j'ai appris à la contrôler. Une rage bien dosée peut sublimer la psykana, de la même manière qu'un fromage bien fait révèle toutes les saveurs d'un amasec arrivé à maturation. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sana göz ucuyla, dudaklarında acı bir tebessümle bakıyor.{/n} "Gündelik iletişimlerimde saf duygulara yer vermeyi gerek görmüyorum. Ancak yeri geldi mi gayet öfkelenebileceğimi de bil. Şansınız var ki odaklama sorunu yaşamıyorum. Yıllanmış bir amasekin bukesini öne çıkaran olgun peynir misali... Savaşırken kararında bir hiddet, ruhsezerliğe çok güzel yakışır."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a sidelong glance, his lips stretched into a caustic smile.{/n} "I don't consider raw emotions to be a necessity in everyday communication. But let me assure you that I am more than capable of anger. Fortunately for others, I learned to focus it. Properly measured rage reveals the full potential of combat psykana in much the same way as aged cheese reveals the notes of a mature amasec."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sana göz ucuyla, dudaklarında acı bir tebessümle bakıyor.{/n} "Gündelik iletişimlerimde saf duygulara yer vermeyi gerek görmüyorum. Ancak yeri geldi mi gayet öfkelenebileceğimi de bil. Şansınız var ki odaklama sorunu yaşamıyorum. Yıllanmış bir amasekin bukesini öne çıkaran olgun peynir misali... Savaşırken kararında bir hiddet, psikanaya çok güzel yakışır."
